DELETE /zones/{zone_id}/email/routing/dn.description: Disable your Email Routing zone. Also removes additional MX records previously required for Email Routing to work.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.
Whether the API call was successful.

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service.

page.description: Current page within paginated list of results.

per_page.description: Number of results per page of results.

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters.

items.description: List of records needed to enable an Email Routing zone.

name.description: DNS record name (or @ for the zone apex).

priority.description: Required for MX, SRV and URI records. Unused by other record types. Records with lower priorities are preferred.

ttl.description: Time to live, in seconds, of the DNS record. Must be between 60 and 86400, or 1 for 'automatic'.

GET /zones/{zone_id}/email/routing.description: Get information about the settings for your Email Routing zone.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

created.description: The date and time the settings have been created.

enabled.description: State of the zone settings for Email Routing.

modified.description: The date and time the settings have been modified.

skip_wizard.description: Flag to check if the user skipped the configuration wizard.

status.description: Show the state of your account, and the type or configuration error.

tag.description: Email Routing settings tag. (Deprecated, replaced by Email Routing settings identifier)
